tidbits.title: Strategic Location
tidbits.description: Djibouti is strategically located at the crossroads of Africa, the Middle East, and Asia, serving as a key maritime and logistics hub.

tidbits.title: Geological Wonders
tidbits.description: The country features unique geological formations, including the otherworldly landscapes of Lac Assal, one of the lowest points on Earth.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Djibouti embraces cultural diversity, influenced by Afar, Somali, Arab, and French heritage, reflected in traditions, languages, and vibrant markets.
